qas.question: Who receives the majority of financial benefits from the gem mining ?

context: Many <a0_0>US and European jewellery companies, including Bulgari, Tiffany, and Cartier, refuse to import these stones based<a0_0/> on <a1_0>reports of deplorable working conditions in the mines.<a1_0/> <a2_0>Human Rights Watch<a2_0/> has <a3_0>encouraged a complete ban on the purchase of Burmese gems based<a3_0/> on these reports and because nearly all profits go to <a4_0>the ruling junta<a4_0/>, as the majority of mining activity in the country is government-run. The government of Myanmar controls the gem trade by direct ownership or by joint ventures with private owners of mines.
